remarks: Version of ~ bj-bdfindis using a class term in the consequent. Constructive proof (from CZF).  See the comment of ~ bj-bdfindis for explanations.  (Contributed by BJ, 21-Nov-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-bdfindis.bd $e |- Bdd ph $.
bj-bdfindis.nf0 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-bdfindis.nf1 $e |- F/ x ch $.
bj-bdfindis.nfsuc $e |- F/ x th $.
bj-bdfindis.0 $e |- ( x = (/) -> ( ps -> ph ) ) $.
bj-bdfindis.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ch ) ) $.
bj-bdfindis.suc $e |- ( x = suc y -> ( th -> ph ) ) $.
bj-bdfindisg.nfa $e |- F/_ x A $.
bj-bdfindisg.nfterm $e |- F/ x ta $.
bj-bdfindisg.term $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph -> ta ) ) $.
bj-bdfindisg $p |- ( ( ps /\ A. y e. _om ( ch -> th ) ) -> ( A e. _om -> ta ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
